summary: A neural network model that leverages a pretrained Data2Vec text encoder to perform token-level classification, mapping each token in an input sequence to a label such as entity type or part‑of‑speech.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑fine‑tune solution for extracting structured information from text streams, supporting use cases like named entity recognition, POS tagging, and other sequence labeling tasks in enterprise NLP pipelines.
